news.title: Subscribe to Our News Now

about.title: About us
about.html:
We streamline the conveyor belt distribution system in the industrial sector.

"Advantex" LLC is the exclusive partner of Habasit and Optibelt, leading conveyor belt manufacturing companies in Uzbekistan.

Habasit International AG (Switzerland) ranks first in the world in conveyor belt production. With over 75 years of activity, Habasit has developed a wide range of high-quality products and services, boasting deep expertise and experience. Today, more than 100 textile, food and beverage, packaging, and airport industries in Uzbekistan benefit from various Habasit products.

Optibelt GmbH (Germany) is one of the leading manufacturers of high-performance toothed and v-belts. Optibelt products are widely used in Uzbekistan in reliable and demanding sectors such as mechanical engineering, automotive, agriculture, and household appliance manufacturing.

Our team consists of experienced and skilled specialists with extensive knowledge and expertise in the textile, food and beverage, and other industries.

We aim not only to meet our customers' functional needs but also to provide the highest quality, individual approach, and reliability.
